metadata.Title: CVE-2023-24329 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue in the urllib.parse component of Python before 3.11.4 allowsattackers to bypass blocklisting methods by supplying a URL that startswith blank characters.

criterions.comment: python2.7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
python3.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
python3.7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
python3.8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
